# Government of Canada
## National Combat Ration Program Long-term Solution (NCRP) Request for Information (RFI)
### RFI Description
The Department of Public Works and Government Services has released a Tender Opportunity for a Request for Information (RFI) related to the National Combat Ration Program Long-term Solution (NCRP). This consultation with industry aims to support and develop the long-term solution for the NCRP.

### Industry Consultation
Feedback from industry stakeholders will be used to validate and assess the Government of Canada's options for delivering efficient and effective combat rations support to the Canadian Armed Forces. This information will be used to develop a procurement approach for a forthcoming Request for Proposal (RFP) related to the NCRP.

### Tender Details
* Reference Number: WS4385816546
* Solicitation Number: WS4385816546
* Publication Date: January 9, 2024
* Closing Date: March 1, 2024 by 14:00 Eastern Standard Time (EST)
* Tender Status: Expired
* Contracting Entity Name: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Contracting Entity Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC K1A 0S5, Canada
* End User Entity Name: Department of National Defence (DND)

### Key Highlights
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Selective Tendering
* Notice Type: Request for Information (RFI)
* UNSPSC Code: 50190000 (Prepared and Preserved Foods)
* Regions of Opportunity: Canada
* Attachment and Supporting Documentation: Full Request for Information (RFI) and attachments available on SAP Ariba account
